title.rendered: Air Moldova sales / agent office in Calispel MT, USA

content.rendered:
Air Moldova is the national airline of Moldova headquartered in Chisinau. It mainly operates scheduled and charter services to destinations within Europe from its base at Chisinau International Airport.

Legal Address:

Dacia bd. 80 / 2, Airport, MD 2026, Chisinau, Moldova

Air Moldova Travel agent / Tour operator: Mission Valley Travel

Air Moldova Calispel MT, USA Address:
112 Cooperative Way, Kalispell, MT 59901

Phone:
+ 1 406 758 4838

Fax: + 1 406 758 48 28
Email: info@mvti.us

Air Moldova Air tickets Sales phone number:

+ 373 22 830 830

Air Moldova Club Center:

Address: Negruzzi 10, MD-2001, Chisinau, Moldova

Phone:+ 373 22 57 65 30

Mobile:+ 373 68 20 45 05

E-mail:  ffp@airmoldova.md

Air Moldova customer care number / Helpdesk (customer service):

Phone:+ 373 22 57 65 45 / + 373 22 83 08 30

Email: info@airmoldova.md

Air Moldova Call Center number: + 373 22 830 830.

PR manager (public relations, publicity):

Phone:+ 373 22 52 54 30

Reception: + 373 22 52 55 02

e-mail: pr@airmoldova.md, info@airmoldova.md

Fax: + 373 22 52 60 09

Air Moldova wheel chair assistance number:

+ 373 22 52 54 54.

Travel during pregnancy in Air Moldova

Expectant mothers can travel up to 32 weeks in Air Moldova. Medical certificate issued not earlier than 72 hours before departure should be presented.

Air Moldova Lost / Damaged Luggage

Phone:+ 373 22 52 51 02

Air Moldova Official website:https://www.airmoldova.md/headofice-en/

Air Moldova Online Check-in: www.airmoldova.com/online check-in

Note:Check In is open 24 hours prior to flight and is available up to 2 hours before departure

Check Air Moldova schedule here: www.Air Moldova.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Moldova flight status here: www.Air Moldova.com/in/gb/flight status

Air Moldova Baggage Allowance

Air Moldova Baggage

View Air Moldova Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Near by Air Moldova Airline office in USA:

View the nearest Air Moldova Airline offices in USA and the address, phone number, website and more.

List of Air Moldova Airline Offices around the world

View the Air Moldova Airline offices address, phone number, email through the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Moldova

Total fleet: 8

Airbus A319

  • Airbus A319-100

Airbus A320

  • Airbus A320-200

Airbus A321

  • Airbus A321-200

Embraer ERJ-145

  • Embraer ERJ-145

Embraer ERJ-190

  • Embraer ERJ-190

McDonnell Douglas MD-80

  • McDonnell Douglas MD-82

Queries handled by Air Moldova Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Air Moldova Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Moldova Calispel MT, USA Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Moldova Calispel MT, USA: (click on the stars below)
